components.description:
A pensive, remorseful face. Saddened by life. Quietly considering where things all went wrong. Depicted as a yellow face with sad, closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a slight, flat mouth.

May convey a variety of sad emotions, including feeling disappointed, hurt, or lonely. Less intense than other sad emojis like ðŸ˜­ Loudly Crying Face and more introspective.

Microsoft's design previously featured a more neutral, bored expression. Samsung’s design previously looked more guilty or worried. Not to be confused with ðŸ˜Œ Relieved Face, which has similarly shaped eyes but in a happier expression.
components.title: Pensive Face

description:
A pensive, remorseful face. Saddened by life. Quietly considering where things all went wrong. Depicted as a yellow face with sad, closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a slight, flat mouth.

May convey a variety of sad emotions, including feeling disappointed, hurt, or lonely. Less intense than other sad emojis like ðŸ˜­ Loudly Crying Face and more introspective.

Microsoft's design previously featured a more neutral, bored expression. Samsung’s design previously looked more guilty or worried. Not to be confused with ðŸ˜Œ Relieved Face, which has similarly shaped eyes but in a happier expression.
title: Pensive Face

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: A pensive, remorsefulÂ face. Saddened by life. Quietly considering where things all went wrong. Pensive Face was approved as part of Unicode  http://emojipedia.org/pensive-face/

bn:00101114a: Affected or marked by low spirits

Experiencing or showing sorrow or unhappiness- Christina Rossetti

bn:00101559a: Marked by low spirits; showing no enthusiasm

bn:00086883v: Fail to meet the hopes or expectations of

bn:00059926n: Sports: unexpected victory of a competitor.

An upset occurs in a competition, frequently in electoral politics or sports, when the party popularly expected to win, is defeated by an underdog whom the majority expects to lose, defying the conventional wisdom.
In a contest, especially in sport, when an underdog beats the strong favourite
An unexpected victory of a competitor that was not favored.

bn:00026402n: State of physical and/or psychological dejectedness, which can lead to unhappiness, pessimism and mistrust.
A mental state characterized by a pessimistic sense of inadequacy and a despondent lack of activity
Depression is a state of low mood and aversion to activity that can affect a person's thoughts, behavior, feelings and sense of well-being.
A state of low mood, also known as melancholy
State of low mood and aversion to activity

bn:00068782n: Sadness is emotional pain associated with, or characterized by feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, helplessness, sorrow, and rage.
Emotions experienced when not in a state of well-being
Sadness is emotional pain associated with, or characterized by feelings of disadvantage, loss, despair, helplessness and sorrow.

bn:00058395n: "OK" is a word denoting approval, acceptance, agreement, assent, or acknowledgment.

apple_vendor_description: The pensive face emoji on Apple devices features a gentle, downturned mouth and slightly furrowed brows, rendered with smooth, subtle shading that gives it a soft, almost tangible quality. Its large, expressive eyes on Apple devices are looking slightly downwards, conveying a deep sense of contemplation, introspection, or a moment of thoughtful sadness. This emoji is perfect for sharing complex emotions or when one is lost in thought.
